Package com.refinedmods.refinedstorage.api.network.grid.handler

Interface IFluidGridHandler

All Known Implementing Classes:
FluidGridHandler, PortableFluidGridHandler
public interface IFluidGridHandler
Defines the behavior of fluid grids.

  • Method Details

    • onExtract

      void onExtract(net.minecraft.server.level.ServerPlayer player, UUID id, boolean shift)
      Called when a player tries to extract a fluid from the grid.
      Parameters:
      player - the player that is attempting the extraction
      id - the id of the fluid we're trying to extract, this id is the id from StackListEntry
      shift - true if shift click was used, false otherwise

    • onInsert

      @Nonnull net.minecraft.world.item.ItemStack onInsert(net.minecraft.server.level.ServerPlayer player, net.minecraft.world.item.ItemStack container)
      Called when a player tries to insert fluids in the grid.
      Parameters:
      player - the player
      container - a stack with a fluid container we're trying to insert
      Returns:
      the remainder, or an empty stack if there is no remainder

    • onInsertHeldContainer

      void onInsertHeldContainer(net.minecraft.server.level.ServerPlayer player)
      Called when a player is trying to insert a fluid that it is holding in their hand in the GUI.
      Parameters:
      player - the player that is attempting the insert

    • onCraftingPreviewRequested

      void onCraftingPreviewRequested(net.minecraft.server.level.ServerPlayer player, UUID id, int quantity, boolean noPreview)
      Called when a player requests the crafting preview window to be opened.
      Parameters:
      player - the player
      id - the id of the fluid we're trying to extract, this id is the id from StackListEntry
      quantity - the amount of that item that we need a preview for
      noPreview - true if the crafting preview window shouldn't be shown, false otherwise

    • onCraftingRequested

      void onCraftingRequested(net.minecraft.server.level.ServerPlayer player, UUID id, int quantity)
      Called when a player requested crafting for an item.
      Parameters:
      player - the player that is requesting the crafting
      id - the id of the fluid we're trying to extract, this id is the id from StackListEntry
      quantity - the amount of the item that has to be crafted
